channel.title: All my drops suddenly not working
channel.description: Hi I am using an allstarscape source and I was editing things and adding a lot of objects in... when I added barrows and stuff to a new area they suddenly didn't drop anything... I went to jad and I killed him and no fire cape dropped. The drops are already set because it already coded in the server and earlier the drops were working. Help would be appreciated :)

[quote=“noobie22, post:4, topic:259628”]Oh. Well It might have helped. Not to much of a Drops on/off person, mostly editing.[/quote]I deleted all my commands, except for my AC ones.

item.title: All my drops suddenly not working
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Happened to me before when i used to code servers. I would actually like to know this as well.

Tbh, i just turned my server off and on a few times and it worked again.

[quote=“noobie22, post:2, topic:259628”]::dropson and ::onpickup[/quote]Didn’t work when it happened to me.

Read full topic
